27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Mughirah bin Shu'bah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Do not vilify the dead (and) by that harm the living

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Vilification
